targets.expr: sum by (set) (avg by (instance,set) (mongodb_connections{state="current"}) * on (instance) group_right avg by (instance,set) (mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state/ mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state))
sum by () (avg by (instance,set) (mongodb_connections{state="current"}) * on (instance) group_right avg by (instance,set) (mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state/ mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state))

sum by (shard) (avg by (instance,shard) (mongodb_connections{state="current"}) * on (instance) group_right avg by (instance,shard) (mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total / mongodb_mongos_db_collections_total))

panels.description: The Cursor is a MongoDB Collection of the document which is returned upon the find method execution.

targets.expr: sum(sum(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"} or mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state) by (set)

sum(sum(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"} or mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state)

panels.title: Cursors Per Shard

panels.description: The Cursor is a MongoDB Collection of the document which is returned upon the find method execution.

targets.expr:
sum by () (
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[5m]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{state="total_open"}[5m])
)

panels.title: Mongos Cursors

targets.expr:
sum by (instance) (
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[5m]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{state="total_open"}[5m])
)

sum by () (
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[5m]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{state="total"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_cursors{state="total_open"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{state="total_open"}[5m])
)

panels.description: Ops/sec, classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore).

targets.expr:
sum(sum(rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{type!="command"}[5m])) by (instance) * on (instance) 
group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state) by (set)

panels.title: Operations Per Shard

panels.description: Ops/sec, classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore).
panels.title: Total Mongos Operations

panels.description: Timespan 'window' between oldest and newest ops in the Oplog collection.

targets.expr: max(max(mongodb_mongod_replset_oplog_head_timestamp-mongodb_mongod_replset_oplog_tail_timestamp) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state) by (set)

panels.title: Oplog Range by Set
